input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Graduation Scene Backdrop - Size 6 Ft. X 6 Ft.

Item keywords:
Perfect for graduation party
Use it for your picture wall
Ready to Hang
Size - 6 ft x 6ft.
input_text.Response A:
Thank you for your interest in our graduation scene backdrop! We are happy to help you find the perfect backdrop for your graduation party.

Our backdrop is 6 ft x 6 ft and is ready to hang. It is perfect for graduation parties and can also be used for picture walls. It is made of high-quality material that is durable and easy to clean.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us.
input_text.Response B: This is a backdrop of a graduation scene. You can use it at a graduation party to take photos with your friends and family. It is 6 feet by 6 feet, so it is big enough for many people to stand in front of it and take pictures together. It is ready to hang up when you receive it.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_a: there is no mention of the product being made of high-quality material or being easy to clean. The start with the thank you for interest
